00022 #include "CdfInformationTable.h"
00023 
00024 CdfInformationTable::CdfInformationTable(sqlite3* AnnotationDb, Configuration* ConfigPtr)
00025 {
00026     m_annotationDb = AnnotationDb;
00027     m_configPtr = ConfigPtr;
00028 }
00029     
00030 void CdfInformationTable::Update()
00031 {
00032     if (m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable.size() > 0)
00033     {        
00034         sqlite3_stmt *insertStatement;
00035 
00036         std::stringstream  commandTextColumns;
00037         commandTextColumns << "INSERT INTO CdfInformation (";
00038         
00039         std::stringstream  commandTextValues;
00040         commandTextValues << " VALUES (";
00041 
00042         map<string, string>::iterator cdfTableRow;
00043         int counter = 0;
00044         for ( cdfTableRow = m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable[0].begin(); cdfTableRow != m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable[0].end(); cdfTableRow++)
00045         {
00046             if (counter > 0)
00047             {
00048                 commandTextColumns << ",";
00049                 commandTextValues << ",";
00050             }
00051 
00052             commandTextColumns << "[" << cdfTableRow->first/*column name*/ << "]";        
00053             commandTextValues << "?";
00054 
00055             counter++;
00056         }
00057 
00058         commandTextColumns << ")";
00059         commandTextValues << ")";
00060 
00061         std::string insertSqlStatement =  commandTextColumns.str() + commandTextValues.str();
00062         int result = sqlite3_prepare_v2(m_annotationDb,  insertSqlStatement.c_str(), -1, &insertStatement, NULL);
00063 
00064         if (result != SQLITE_OK)
00065         {       
00066             sqlite3_finalize(insertStatement);              
00067             throw Except("Internal error. Failed to prepare INSERT INTO CdfInformation statement. Make sure that table exists, and columns in the table and in the configuration file CdfInformationTableRow node match each other.");
00068         }
00069         
00070         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable.size(); i++)
00071         {
00072             int bindingIndex = 1;
00073             for ( cdfTableRow = m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable[i].begin(); cdfTableRow != m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable[i].end(); cdfTableRow++)
00074             { 
00075                 if(sqlite3_bind_text(insertStatement, bindingIndex, cdfTableRow->second.c_str(), cdfTableRow->second.length(), SQLITE_TRANSIENT) != SQLITE_OK)
00076                 {                
00077                     std::stringstream message;            
00078                     message << "Could not bind parameters for CdfInformation table update! column name: '" << cdfTableRow->first << "' column value: '" << cdfTableRow->second << "'";
00079                     throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00080                 }
00081                 bindingIndex++;
00082             }
00083             int result = sqlite3_step(insertStatement);
00084             if (result != SQLITE_DONE) 
00085             {
00086                 sqlite3_finalize(insertStatement);
00087                 std::stringstream message;            
00088                 if (result == SQLITE_CONSTRAINT)   
00089                 {//* Contraint violation 
00090                     message << "Error executing SQL statement during CdfInformation table update due to constraint violation!\n";
00091                     message << "Make sure CdfInformationTableRow nodes in both configuration files have no duplicated values for unique fields such as the filename or the guid.\n"; 
00092                     message << "Check the CdfInformation table for other constraints.\n\n";
00093                 }
00094                 else
00095                 {
00096                     message << "Could not execute SQL statement during CdfInformation table update! Error code: " << result << "\n";
00097                 }
00098                 message << "CdfInformationTableRow causes the problem:\n";
00099                 for ( cdfTableRow = m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable[i].begin(); cdfTableRow != m_configPtr->m_cdfInformationTable[i].end(); cdfTableRow++)
00100                 {
00101                     message << "Attrib:'" << cdfTableRow->first.c_str() << "' Value'" << cdfTableRow->second.c_str() << "'\n";
00102                 } 
00103                 message  << "\n";
00104                 
00105                 throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00106             }
00107             sqlite3_reset(insertStatement);
00108             sqlite3_clear_bindings(insertStatement);
00109         }
00110         sqlite3_finalize(insertStatement);
00111     }
00112 }
